column4: The laptop overheats and the video lags!  How do I downgrade my kernel?
The laptop overheats and the video lags!  How do I downgrade my kernel?
have you tried leaning your laptop
It used to never do that until 9.10.  I cannot access the boot menu in Lucid Lynx.
thats probably a lucid problem go to ubuntu+1 for hep with that

it will interface with temperature gauges and fans i think, measn the fan will come on:p
it will run automatically if you have it installed
link me the specs of your laptop
Acer Aspire 5315 with 1.8ghz celeron and 3GB RAM.  https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/532978
